items.title: Five seconds changed the entire season for the Colts
items.summary: Football is a game of inches. It is also a game of seconds. It doesn’t take long for a moment to completely alter a play, a game, or a season. Three moments across five or so seconds dictated the outcome of the game between the Indianapolis Colts and the Houston Texans. Naturally, there were 3,595 […]

items.title: Colts sign Kicker Blake Grupe to Practice Squad
items.summary: The 3rd search for a Colts Kicker in 2025 is over, and a new leg is in town. Blake Grupe is a 3rd year Kicker who spent 2023-2025 with the Saints. He went 75/94 in his time in New Orleans with the following distance splits. Don’t mistake the 5’7 156 lb kicker for lacking power, […]

items.title: Colts Waive Michael Badgley
items.summary: The “Money Badger’s” time with the Colts has come to a close once again. He has been waived by the Colts after missing his 3rd extra point (18/21) in his 7 games with the Colts in 2025. He was 10/11 on Field Goals, including 2/3 from 50+ yards. But after Badgley’s miss contributed to a […]

items.title: Colts waive K Michael Badgley, sign ex-Saint Blake Grupe
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – Enough was enough. Two days after missing his third PAT in seven games, Michael Badgley has been waived. The Indianapolis Colts decided they no longer had trust in Badgley, who had handled their kicking since Spencer Shrader suffered a season-ending knee injury against the Las Vegas Raiders. According to a person with knowledge [...]
